panels.description: All haproxy instances in this cluster ${cls}
Service among cluster. Number of routes from proxy to server
Session are created between proxies(haproxy) and servers(postgres).
panels.title: Active Session

targets.expr: count(sum by (proxy) (haproxy_backend_current_sessions{ins="$ins", proxy!="stats"})) or on() vector(0)

panels.description:
Services SLI is measured by Service availability
If all routes (lb->server) for a service is down, the service (of the lb instance is treated as Down)
panels.title: Service SLI (1 Month)

targets.expr:
1 * min without(state) (haproxy_server_status{ins="$ins", proxy="$svc", state="UP"})
+ 2 * min without(state) (haproxy_server_status{ins="$ins", proxy="$svc", state="DRAIN"})
+ 4 * min without(state) (haproxy_server_status{ins="$ins", proxy="$svc", state="MAINT"})
+ 8 * min without(state) (haproxy_server_status{ins="$ins", proxy="$svc", state="NOLB"})

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls

list.description: Node name of current postgres instance
list.label: Node
list.name: node
